WRITING.TITLE: How did this happen?

Gunpowder was made by gnomes. Gnomes are secretive about their inventions so the rest of the world didn't find out that gnomes had gunpowder until the gnomes had made guns and bombs. It is still rare. So no, you can NOT blow up a guardhouse with gunpowder that isn't there...Yes, oil would work. Roll

WRITING.TITLE: So I came out to my friend yesterday...
WRITING.TEXT: So, I just realized I was bi and decided to tell one of my best friends who was also bi. I had been dealing emotional with stuff and hadn #8217;t laughed all day. We were hanging out in a discord call playing games and this is the conversation that followed: Me: Hey, I have to tell you something. I #8217;m bi. Him: Wait, really? How did you find out? Me: I don #8217;t know, it kind of just clicked. I realized that I like- Him: It in the ass. Both: *A good 30 seconds of laughter* Me: Thanks I needed that. That is what friends are for. Making you laugh even when you are nervous. Also, for clarification, the word I was going to say was guys. And if you are reading this Coco, thanks for that. You really made my day.

WRITING.TITLE: I'll get there eventually
Semi true story

WRITING.TEXT: Same
He is one of the funniest guys I know.
I found out I was bi this week actually.
Started the same way for me. I only realized I was bi this week. Don #8217;t worry, you #8217;ll figure it out.
That is my 2nd favorite Moki. Father Moki is my favorite. Great, I #8217;m sad now.
Nice
Fine, I #8217;ll do my homework. Only because the dog told me to.
I #8217;m throwing away my hand Jojo!

I only tell people to get it off my chest. I only plan to tell my close friends and family. I will be honest if anyone asks but otherwise won #8217;t bring it up. It isn #8217;t a big deal for me. I just feel that some people should know without having to ask me first.
My teacher said he did that once. He didn #8217;t count the test as a grade, he just did it for fun.
He is number 3.

WRITING.TITLE: This meme is the perfect example

WRITING.TEXT: Oh come on. This is the third post like this I #8217;ve seen today. Let me watch avatar without questioning my sexuality every ten minutes.
I go through all of those every ten minutes.

WRITING.TITLE: "You will never win." "No, but I can lose again. And again, and again, and again, forever. And that makes you my prisoner."

WRITING.TEXT: That kind of sums me up. Minus the finger guns, I don #8217;t do those.
Can I have a link?
That is the best way I #8217;ve seen that explained. I just can #8217;t make movies references with that.
It is a reference to Dr. Strange. The explanation was amazing.
We have to wake up to it too.
Not all of us. Just the loud ones.
Hi soul master. Why are you still alive after I killed you?
We have no idea what we are doing. If America could stop, that would be great.
My horny femboy warlock disagrees. (I was sleep deprived at the time but he was too good to get rid of)
I have no words for how confused I am right now.
I need a good route to take, any suggestions?
Thanks! If you wouldn #8217;t mind giving me a basic outline or we could find a way to meet up in-game.
I would say 1/3 chance.
My friends refuse to play mobile.
You came looking for gold and found 50% more gold then expected
What are you talking about? Magic missile is a level one spell not level two.
Win win scenario
I have the same schedule

I understand what you are going through. If I had any advice it would be to find yourself a small group of friends that accept you. To be honest, I only feel anything when I am with my little group. Otherwise, it is just a sad trudge to the next time I can talk to them.
I tried to kill that thing for a solid minute.

I love Alphys. Mostly because we do the same things but she is much better at them. I was talking to my friends about the determination experiments and I asked what would happen if two entities had the same amount. I would have created and tested 10ish flower demons before Undyne would have punted me off a cliff. Also, we watch an unhealthy amount of anime.
I #8217;m going to be honest, they don #8217;t even have to be my crush. Cuddles are cuddles and all my friends are weebs.
It is funny because that is what Nott would do
Pretty good campaign you got there. Mine usually has an ungodly amount of explosions and me screwing up the CR.
At least I don #8217;t have to cry. I consider it a win.
Tome. More cantrips and I don #8217;t have to sleep.
I don #8217;t sleep anyways. I might as well not be tired. As a bonus, you can be the avatar by choosing all four elemental control cantrips.
That was one of the best things I #8217;ve ever read. I will use that as a wholesome warlock patron in dnd.
You got to it first.
How did I hear a zoom sound effect in my head?

WRITING.TITLE: You can know someone for years and not know what color their eyes are.
Teachers probably hate grading homework as much as we hate doing it.

WRITING.TEXT: No, it makes me tremendously forgetful.
All my friends write in chicken scratch. We can read each other #8217;s writing perfectly.
That is my life right now
*Begins word for word quoting the 17 pages of homework I sent to my friend because he forgot.*
They try. They just don #8217;t really do it well. Almost all of my friends have some form of depression.
That sums it up
I just pretend accept any compliments I get. Most of the time I #8217;m being made fun of anyways.
Blue/black.
Giant Bumbum, Closer view. That is the funniest thing I #8217;ve seen on Reddit today.
I feel like this was written by the mimic.

That same friend will still fight to the bitter end on anything dnd related. I am always right because I have played a year longer but he still refuses to give up. I am the dm running a homebrew setting.

So, weird question. Can you explain pansexual to me like I am five? I still don #8217;t know the difference between bi and pan after about an hour of research and not asking anyone because I #8217;m an introvert.
Really happy for you. Plus, your English is better then mine. (And it is my native language).
So...still don #8217;t know the difference but I #8217;m going to keep using bi.
Yes, also social anxiety
Yes

This really helps. I only have one that I truly care about though. I honestly don #8217;t care if I die but I hate to think about what will happen to my friends and family if I kill myself. A lot of my friends are in bad places and I don #8217;t want to make anything worse for them. I know this is a rent and probably shouldn #8217;t be saying this but I just need to vent. I just feel like I can never do enough for them when they are literally keeping me alive. Sorry for taking up your feed.
True for bisexuals as well. I have two straight friends out of five.
Dnd is great during the pandemic. I #8217;m going to use them for my bisexual warlock.

WRITING.TITLE: Need help for Eden
WRITING.TEXT: Pretty much what the title says. I don #8217;t want to start over so I delayed going there till now. If anyone has any tips that helps first timers, I would love to hear them. Edit: Just did a solo blind run and came out with 6 candles and four lights. Thank you for all your help.
They already have piercing resistance. Fire resistance makes a lot of sense. Not much to burn on bones.
The only thing I can think of is take a shooting enemy with you. I don #8217;t remember if there are any in the area.
Same! I had to start over because all the dark was burned before I got there.
What is skytober?

WRITING.TITLE: To the people that follow me on Reddit, can you not do that? It makes me kind of uncomfortable knowing that you can see anything I do.

WRITING.TEXT: Same thing is happening to me. Sorry to hear that it happens to you too.
Repost but same.
Who? Who the hell asked for this?
As a dm, I love this
Glad to know I #8217;m not the only one who talks to my characters.
Yes, yes we are.
That is why I make the fine points of my backstory after session three. Not too early so I can fit in to the party and plot. Not too late so I have a backstory and modification for my pc.
What is that and where can I get one?
It didn #8217;t really help much but I have Hamilton stuck in my head now so at least I smiled.
That was the first mistake. Never expect a normal party. I was just in a one shot were everyone was a kenku and we each played differently. The dm rolled with it perfectly.

That is what hoodies are for. Just don #8217;t wear short sleeve in front of your parents. Luckily, my parents are unperceptive and don #8217;t care about my mental health. No conversation for me, thank you.
I only have two coping mechanisms. One is waking up my friends and venting to them for hours as they try to talk me out of cutting myself. The other is cutting myself.

WRITING.TITLE: I got killed after one line

WRITING.TEXT: A group I #8217;m in runs the whole game on discord. You mute your mike as soon as it starts and unmute for meetings. Must be confusing for the 2-3 randoms that join.
The ironic thing is that op made a subreddit dedicated to catching reposters.

WRITING.TITLE: I found a reposter
WRITING.TEXT: It was you. You reposted on October 4th of 2020. It has been posted multiple times in that week. I #8217;m just calling you out on it because you made this sub.
I would ask how you know this but I #8217;m not sure I want to know.
Good twist on an old joke. Great art btw.

This is exactly what I am doing right now. Literally down to the letter. I just want you to know you aren #8217;t the only one who feels this way. Try taking small steps away from self harm. It is really hard to do. Trust me, I was six days clean as of last night. You can also try to find someone to open up to. It will feel like you are dumbing your problems on someone else but it will help you. Again, I speak from experience. I know I am the last person that should be giving advice because I am in the same situation and failing every aspect of helping myself. I am just giving tips on what has helped me, no matter how small. Feeling this way sucks. Just know that you aren #8217;t alone.
They also called you a reposter.
r/Meme_Watch_Guards

My gith necromancer tries to be dark and edgy but is really just disappointed in humans. Dead people are better because they listen and don #8217;t do dumb stuff. *10 sessions later* I am going on a quest at the risk of all our lives so I can get a death dog. Nobody can stop me! Nobody!
Messed up on day six yesterday. I don #8217;t see the point of stopping but my friends told me to.
I almost downvoted this by habit from the amount of times I saw that other meme.
Seriously, don #8217;t take your life. Try to find a support group to help you. Multiple people in the comments have offered to pm you and that offer stands with me as well.
Please tell me the fiber pun was on purpose
Susie looks like she is trying to stab someone with an axe. That is something she would try to do.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like a hypocrite
WRITING.TEXT: It is so hard to talk someone out of suicide when all you want to do is die. I hate having to act strong for other people when I have to force myself to do even the simplest things.
You though it was candles, but it was me, dio!

Lifeblood cave spoiler: So, do you know the lifeblood cave? Well I died there, don #8217;t judge me. So I went back in and then left. I forgot the part were the door closed. I was too lazy to use an egg and had already gotten the unbreakable charms. How do I add spoilers?
Everything is a Jojo reference because Jojo is a reference to everything else.

I still don #8217;t fully understand the differences between these but I decided to identify as bi for three reasons. 1. It was the only one I knew about and I relate to the community 2. I like the flag the best 3. If I chose to identify as pan (the one I considered) I would have to endure kitchen jokes for the rest of my life because that is the kind of friends I have. That would be more annoying then the #8220;Bi is just Diet Gay #8221; joke we have. Note: Most of my friends are LGBTQ+ and we are all ok with the jokes we make. They don #8217;t mean any harm and the one who came up with the joke is also bi. I just didn #8217;t want to offend anyone.
I will stop messing with trash when people stop throwing away rare items.
Ten stand that could beat DIO. Number one: Jotaro Me: Thank you for the information.
